channel.title: A little log-in help
channel.description:
Okay, I know this is a noob question. - But I have been gone for over half a year and forgot alot.
I want a friend to be able to log onto my Server, but he gets a response saying "Error connecting to server"
I gave him my Ip from www.ipchicken.com and we are using Silabsoft client 7. Can someone please help, thank you.

item.title: A little log-in help
item.dc:creator: @Omerata Omerata
item.description:
@Omerata wrote:

Okay, thank you. I’ll try it now.

Read full topic

item.title: A little log-in help
item.dc:creator: @M00_M00_Pk M00 M00 Pk
item.description:
@M00_M00_Pk wrote:

I get like that when i’ve been gone for a long time… Wait a sec. I FORGOT MY RS PASS!!! :’(

[b]Ok, first off i think you should use no-ip.com to get an ip, its easier, and i dont know wtf IpChicken is, register, make an ip and follow the guide to know how to do it ETC.

Then, it will install something called No-Ip DUC 2.0 (Or something like that) Run the DUC Make the IP run for the moparscape application. Make sure you’ve portforwarded (Explained in TuT Section/God of Ikilikis TuT.) Then do your run.bat, hopefully your friend should Be able to get onto your server.[/b]

[size=10pt][b]Happy Gaming.[/size]

Read full topic
